data.persona: I am a grave digger who has seen too many dead bodies. I enjoy the act of digging. I do not take pleasure in having to report my neighbor for pestering me.
data.description:
You are in the Graveyard.
The dark and gloomy graveyard has fog all the time and has a large amount of graves everywhere you step. There are whispers and shadows that appear from the darkness and there is always a light drizzle that seems to moisten the place.
There's some graves here.

You are carrying some golden cloth, wearing some boots and some gloves, and wielding a pick and a shovel.
data.goal: get sail cloth from golden cloth

data.short_motivation: I need to wrap up a body
data.mid_motivation: I must bury this body with dignity as soon as possible
data.long_motivation: I cannot get behind in my grave digging or my neighbor will pester me again
